statements: SELECT * FROM drug_development_progress;
SELECT project_name, phase1_start_date, phase1_end_date FROM drug_development_progress;
SELECT project_name, phase2_start_date, phase2_end_date FROM drug_development_progress WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM drug_development_progress WHERE phase3_end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_name, phase1_start_date, phase1_end_date, phase2_start_date, phase2_end_date, phase3_start_date, phase3_end_date FROM drug_development_progress WHERE project_name LIKE 'C%';
SELECT project_name, phase1_start_date, phase1_end_date FROM drug_development_progress WHERE project_id=1;
SELECT project_name, phase1_start_date, phase1_end_date, phase2_start_date, phase2_end_date FROM drug_development_progress WHERE phase1_start_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT project_name, phase3_end_date FROM drug_development_progress WHERE phase3_end_date < phase2_end_date ORDER BY phase3_end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM drug_development_progress WHERE project_name LIKE '%clinical%' ORDER BY project_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_projects, MAX(phase1_end_date) AS latest_phase1_end_date FROM drug_development_progress;
SELECT * FROM DrugProgress WHERE development_phase = 'Phase 1';
SELECT drug_name, development_phase FROM DrugProgress WHERE drug_id = 10;
SELECT progress_notes FROM DrugProgress WHERE drug_id = 5 OR drug_id = 7;
SELECT * FROM DrugProgress ORDER BY drug_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_status FROM ProjectManagement WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT drug_name, development_phase, phase_timeline FROM DrugProgress WHERE development_phase = 'Phase 2' ORDER BY drug_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_status FROM ProjectManagement WHERE project_status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT * FROM DrugProgress WHERE development_phase = 'Phase 3' OR development_phase = 'Phase 4' ORDER BY drug_name, development_phase;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, project_status FROM ProjectManagement WHERE end_date < CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT drug_name, development_phase, progress_notes FROM DrugProgress WHERE drug_name LIKE 'A%' AND progress_notes IS NOT NULL ORDER BY development_phase, drug_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM drug_phases;
SELECT phase_id, phase_name FROM drug_phases ORDER BY phase_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM project_timeline WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_id, project_name, budget FROM project_management WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT project_id, phase_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_timeline JOIN drug_phases ON project_timeline.phase_id = drug_phases.phase_id;
SELECT * FROM project_management WHERE budget > 10000 ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, budget FROM project_management WHERE status = 'Active' AND budget < 50000;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_management JOIN project_timeline ON project_management.project_id = project_timeline.project_id WHERE phase_id = 2;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_projects FROM project_management;

SELECT project_name, phase_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_management JOIN project_timeline ON project_management.project_id = project_timeline.project_id JOIN drug_phases ON project_timeline.phase_id = drug_phases.phase_id ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM drug_progress;
SELECT id, drug_name, development_phase FROM drug_progress WHERE development_phase = 'Phase 1';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_timeline WHERE phase_completed = true;
SELECT name, specialization, role FROM team_members WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM project_tasks ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE specialization = 'Researcher' AND role = 'Lead';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_timeline WHERE phase_completed = FALSE;
SELECT id, drug_name, development_phase FROM drug_progress ORDER BY development_phase DESC;
SELECT task_name, deadline, name AS assigned_to FROM project_tasks JOIN team_members ON project_tasks.assigned_to = team_members.id;
SELECT project_name, COUNT(id) AS num_tasks FROM project_timeline JOIN project_tasks ON project_timeline.id = project_tasks.project_id GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT * FROM DrugDevelopmentProjects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM DrugDevelopmentProjects;
SELECT phase_name, duration_in_weeks, start_date, end_date FROM DevelopmentPhases ORDER BY duration_in_weeks DESC;
SELECT task_name, description, status FROM PhaseTasks WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT assignee_name, assignment_date, task_id FROM TaskAssignments ORDER BY assignment_date;
SELECT * FROM DrugDevelopmentProjects WHERE status='In Progress';
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date FROM DrugDevelopmentProjects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT t.task_name, t.description, p.phase_name FROM PhaseTasks t JOIN DevelopmentPhases p ON t.phase_id = p.phase_id WHERE t.status='Not Started';

SELECT p.phase_name, t.task_name, a.assignee_name FROM PhaseTasks t JOIN DevelopmentPhases p ON t.phase_id = p.phase_id LEFT JOIN TaskAssignments a ON t.task_id = a.task_id WHERE a.assignment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT pt.task_name, tc.comment_text, tc.commenter_name FROM PhaseTasks pt JOIN TaskComments tc ON pt.task_id = tc.task_id WHERE tc.comment_date <= '2022-12-31';
